IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: To provide research in health care relating to women, infants, and their families. Areas of concentration include obstetrics, gynecology, pediatrics, and pathology.
IRS990.MissionDescription: TO PROMOTE WOMENS HEALTH, RESEARCH & EDUCATION
IRS990.Description: Medical Research. Establish, develop and promote programs to improve the health of women and infants. also supports international womancare initiative (0 patients).

NameBusiness.BusinessNameLine1: University of Pittsburgh Office of Research Cost Accounting

OtherLiabilities.Description: Deposits Held in Custody for Others

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: Part V Line 4 Intended Uses of endowments. Endowments are used to support the organization's medical research and education activites.
Line 4b: (1,814,643) Contribution Revenue into Temporary and Permanent Endowments; $4,174,707 released from temporarily restricted endowments for program services

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: accounting software and spreadsheets are used to track grant expenditures

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Prior to filing the Form 990 is reviewed and approved by the independent accounting firm who conducted the annual financial statements and A-133 audits.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Conflict of Interest Policy is regularly and consistently enforced and monitored. Training of the policy is given to new employees during Orientation. Policy is overseen by the Research Advisory Committee. Annually the Executive Director submits data of number of Investigators who submitted Statements of Outside Interests and Activities along with details of remedical action taken, if applicable.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Board of Directors approves the compensation of the Executive Director on an annual basis

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: 1) Conflict of Interest Policy is posted on organization's website, www.mwrif.org 2) Governing documents and financial statements are available in the organization's office located at 3339 Ward Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15213
